title: CaptivePortalLogin keeps stopping since June security update
content:
Since the June security update was installed on my Pixel 2, I have been unable to use public WiFi networks that require a signin page - the response from the phone is "CaptivePortalLogin keeps stopping". When I do an Internet search for this problem, I see other users complaining of the same problem after installing the June update. e.g.

https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/bzdfy3/captiveportallogin_keeps_stopping/
https://www.reddit.com/r/GooglePixel/comments/bz4rht/captive_portal_login_keeps_stopping/

I did a reset on the phone and that didn't fix it, so I'd say it's Google's screwup...

Nick
